      • safeUpdateOfAttributes

        public MinimalSourceDetailsDTO safeUpdateOfAttributes(Source sourceToUpdate,
                                                      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> attributes)
        This method does a safe update of source assigned to a subject. It will allow updates of attributes only.
        Parameters:
        sourceToUpdate - source fetched from database
        attributes - value to update
        Returns:
        Updated MinimalSourceDetailsDTO of source

      • updateSource

        @Transactional
public SourceDTO updateSource(SourceDTO sourceDto)
        Updates a source. Does not allow to transfer a source, if it is currently assigned. Does not allow to transfer if new project does not have valid source-type.
        Parameters:
        sourceDto - source details to update.
        Returns:
        updated source.
